original: thams cad gzugs ni 'jigs byed pa //
analyzed: thams cad gzugs ni 'jigs byed pa //
translated: The form of all is terrifying,

original: dril bu yi ge mig la'o //
analyzed: dril bu yi ge mig la'o //
translated: the seed syllable of Ghaṇṭā is in the eyes.

original: zhes pa ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yi ge h'um nag po ste ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yi ge h'um nag po ste ;
translated: The seed syllable of the nature of the earth element is the black HŪṀ.

original: lus ni 'jam dang dril bu'i mchog / ces 'dir gsungs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: lus ni 'jam dang dril bu'i mchog / ces 'dir gsungs pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because it is said here, “The body is soft and supreme among bells,”

original: 'jam dpal dang dril bu ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jam dpal dang dril bu ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Mañjuśrī and Ghaṇṭā are the nature of the two.

original: yi ge h'um las shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge h'um las shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is to be known from the syllable HŪṀ.

original: stong pa'i sa bon ldan pa yi //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: stong pa'i sa bon ldan pa yi // zhes pa ni /
translated: Endowed with the seed of emptiness,🔽the seed of the nature of space is the white A.

original: stong ba ni rna ba dang sna'i bu ga ste /
analyzed: stong ba ni rna ba dang sna'i bu ga ste /
translated: Emptiness is the openings of the ears and nose.

original: de la bkod pa la rlung gi rang bzhin yum dmar po zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la bkod pa la rlung gi rang bzhin yum dmar po zhes pa'o //
translated: The seed syllable placed there is the nature of wind, the red YAṀ.

original: bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni //
analyzed: bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the water of nectar

original: zhes pa chu'i rang bzhin yi ge sum dkar po //
analyzed: zhes pa chu'i rang bzhin yi ge sum dkar po //
translated: is the nature of water, the white SUṀ.

original: seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis //
analyzed: seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis //
translated: The seed of the lion is stacked.

original: zhes pa smryu dkar ser ro //
analyzed: zhes pa smryu dkar ser ro //
translated: This is the white and yellow syllable.

original: stag mo'i sa bon ni brtsegs pa yis //
analyzed: stag mo'i sa bon ni brtsegs pa yis //
translated: The seed of the tigress is stacked.

original: zhes ba ni hmryu dkar nag go //
analyzed: zhes ba ni hmryu dkar nag go //
translated: This is the white and black syllable.

original: ce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa yis //
analyzed: ce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa yis //
translated: The seed of the jackal is stacked.

original: zhes pa ni ymryum dmar nag go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ymryum dmar nag go //
translated: This is the dark red syllable.🔽The seed of the cow is the protector.

original: phyugs kyis bon gyis bsrung zhes pa ni kshmryu dmar ser ro //
analyzed: phyugs kyis bon gyis bsrung zhes pa ni kshmryu dmar ser ro //
translated: This is the red and yellow syllable.

original: sa bon dag kyang bzung nas kyang //
analyzed: sa bon dag kyang bzung nas kyang //
translated: Having taken up the seeds,

original: lha 'gyed dag kyang sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: lha 'gyed dag kyang sbyar bar bya //
translated: one should also apply the distribution of the gods.

original: zhes pa ni yi ge kshum la sogs pa sa bon de brgyad kyis /
analyzed: zhes pa ni yi ge kshum la sogs pa sa bon de brgyad kyis /
translated: This is the eight seeds such as the syllable kṣuṃ.

original: drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa brgyad /
analyzed: drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa brgyad /
translated: The eight such as the ḍākinī of wrath are

original: rnal 'byor pa'i spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas brgyad la bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas brgyad la bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: to be meditated on the eight places such as the crown of the yogin.

original: de dag mdog dang sa bon ni //
analyzed: de dag mdog dang sa bon ni //
translated: Their colors and seeds

original: lus la thams cad 'bar bar ro //
analyzed: lus la thams cad 'bar bar ro //
translated: are all blazing on the body.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: rnal 'byor ba'i lus brgyad las bon de dag 'bar bar bsgom mo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i lus brgyad las bon de dag 'bar bar bsgom mo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: the meaning of meditating on the blazing of those seeds from the eight bodies of the yogin.

original: de nas de ltar lha bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas bdud rtsi dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas de ltar lha bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas bdud rtsi dbab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Then, the yoga of meditating on the deity in that way is taught to be the ritual of the descent of nectar.

original: steng gi mche ba gnyis pa las //
analyzed: steng gi mche ba gnyis pa las //
translated: From the two upper fangs

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: de la chu sbyin ro 'dra'i mchu //
analyzed: de la chu sbyin ro 'dra'i mchu //
translated: In that regard, the lips are like the taste of the water offering.

original: zhes pa ni ya so mche ba'i nang rol lce rtsar thug pa rtag tu chu 'dzag pa'o ma'i chu zhes pa'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ya so mche ba'i nang rol lce rtsar thug pa rtag tu chu 'dzag pa'o ma'i chu zhes pa'i rtsa'o //
translated: The upper teeth are the inner fangs, and the tongue touches the root. The channel called the mother's water always drips water.

original: de la 'dzag pa'i chu ni ci 'dra ba yin zhe na /🔽tshva chu'i mdog ltar gyur 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: de la 'dzag pa'i chu ni ci 'dra ba yin zhe na / tshva chu'i mdog ltar gyur 'dra ba'i //
translated: What is the water that drips from that?🔽The water of the two fangs is water

original: chu ni mche ba gnyis kyi chu //
analyzed: chu ni mche ba gnyis kyi chu //
translated: that resembles the color of salt water.

original: zhes so // chu gang nas 'bab ce na gsungs pa /🔽lce yi dngos kyis brten pa yi //
analyzed: zhes so // chu gang nas 'bab ce na gsungs pa / lce yi dngos kyis brten pa yi //
translated: From where does the water flow?🔽The water that is supported by the substance of the tongue

original: chu yang steng gi bdud rtsi lce //
analyzed: chu yang steng gi bdud rtsi lce //
translated: is the upper nectar of the tongue.

original: steng 'byung zhes so //
analyzed: steng 'byung zhes so //
translated: It is said to arise above.

original: bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa gang zhen //
analyzed: bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa gang zhen //
translated: What is the channel of the descending nectar?

original: dpral ba zhes pa ni mig gi rtsa'o //
analyzed: dpral ba zhes pa ni mig gi rtsa'o //
translated: The forehead is the eye channel.

original: spyi gtsug ces pa ni tshangs pa'i rtsa spyi bo'i rtsa'o//
analyzed: spyi gtsug ces pa ni tshangs pa'i rtsa spyi bo'i rtsa'o//
translated: The crown is the brahmin channel of the crown.

original: @51b sna dag dang zhes pa ni sna'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: @51b sna dag dang zhes pa ni sna'i rtsa'o //
translated: The two nostrils are the two channels of the nose.

original: rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab nas kyang //
analyzed: rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab nas kyang //
translated: And behind the two ears

original: zhes pa ni rna ba'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rna ba'i rtsa'o //
translated: are the two channels of the ears.

original: 'di bzhi dang gong gi mche ba'i rtsa dang lnga 'dus nas 'bab pa'i bdud rtsi lce drung du 'byung ngo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di bzhi dang gong gi mche ba'i rtsa dang lnga 'dus nas 'bab pa'i bdud rtsi lce drung du 'byung ngo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the nectar that flows from the union of these four and the channel of the fangs above is produced in front of the tongue.

original: dper na ci 'dra ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dper na ci 'dra ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked what is the example of that, it is said:

original: ba yi nu mar bzhag pa bzhin//🔽ngo bo drangs nas 'byor par bya //
analyzed: ba yi nu mar bzhag pa bzhin// ngo bo drangs nas 'byor par bya //
translated: Like placing it in the udder of a cow.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: The meaning is that the essence is drawn and placed.

original: ji ltar ba'i lus la khyab pa'i 'o ma nu ma la 'dus pa bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar ba'i lus la khyab pa'i 'o ma nu ma la 'dus pa bzhin du /
translated: Just as the milk that pervades the body of a cow is collected in the udder,

original: rtsa lnga'i dngos po las drangs nas lce drung kho nar gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa lnga'i dngos po las drangs nas lce drung kho nar gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: the essence is drawn from the five channels and placed only in front of the tongue.

original: bdud rtsi dngos bsdus pa des ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /🔽mchod rten dbu rus bon ni //
analyzed: bdud rtsi dngos bsdus pa des ci bya zhe na gsungs pa / mchod rten dbu rus bon ni //
translated: If it is asked, What is done with that collected nectar?

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said: The syllable of the head bone of the stupa and so on.

original: srol mdud nang du mchod rten bsams nas /
analyzed: srol mdud nang du mchod rten bsams nas /
translated: Having visualized the stupa inside the channel knot,

original: de'i rtse mo na yi ge bkod do //
analyzed: de'i rtse mo na yi ge bkod do //
translated: the syllable is placed on the top of that.

original: yang na yi ge h'um gi dbyibs mchod rten du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na yi ge h'um gi dbyibs mchod rten du shes par bya ste /
translated: Or else, one should know the shape of the syllable hūṃ as a stūpa.

original: de la gong nas 'dus pa'i bdud rtsi des yi ge h'um gi steng du blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de la gong nas 'dus pa'i bdud rtsi des yi ge h'um gi steng du blugs par bya'o //
translated: There, one should pour the nectar that has been drawn up from below onto the syllable hūṃ.

original: mchod rten de na mar zag pa gar thim zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: mchod rten de na mar zag pa gar thim zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Where does the nectar that remains dissolve?

original: lhag ma srol gong thim par bya //
analyzed: lhag ma srol gong thim par bya //
translated: The remainder dissolves into the channel above.

original: zhes gong nas bdud rtsi drangs pa'i don ston nas 'og nas yang 'dren pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes gong nas bdud rtsi drangs pa'i don ston nas 'og nas yang 'dren pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Having taught the meaning of “drawing up the nectar from below,” the rite of drawing up from above is taught:

original: yar 'dren mar 'dren sa bon gyis //
analyzed: yar 'dren mar 'dren sa bon gyis //
translated: Drawing up from above and below with the seed.

original: thams cad thabs kyis drangs nas su //
analyzed: thams cad thabs kyis drangs nas su //
translated: Having drawn up everything with the method,

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: there.

original: de la yar 'dren mar 'dren sa bon ni yi ge phat de lus smad las thabs kyis drangs nas srol gong la thim par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la yar 'dren mar 'dren sa bon ni yi ge phat de lus smad las thabs kyis drangs nas srol gong la thim par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Drawing up from above and below with the seed means that the syllable phaṭ draws up the nectar from below with the method and causes it to dissolve into the channel above.

original: smad kyi gnas drang ba'i sa dgu gsungs pa /
analyzed: smad kyi gnas drang ba'i sa dgu gsungs pa /
translated: The nine locations of the lower part are taught:🔽The urinary meatus, the anus,

original: chu so rgyab kyi chu mdo dang // zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: chu so rgyab kyi chu mdo dang // zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: de la / rkang par dus dang yi dags me //
analyzed: de la / rkang par dus dang yi dags me //
translated: The feet, the time, the pretas, and fire

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: are the four below.

original: de la dus kyi me ni rkang pa g-yas pa'o //
analyzed: de la dus kyi me ni rkang pa g-yas pa'o //
translated: The fire of time is the right foot.

original: yi dags me rkang pa g-yon pa'o //

analyzed: sgo gcig nas ni drangs nas kyang // sgo dgu dag tu gzhag par bya //

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /

analyzed: de la sgo gcig nas ni srol gong nas drangs nas glo ba la 'dus pa'i bdud rtsi @52a * //
translated: In that regard, having drawn it up through one opening, the nectar

translated: that is gathered in the lungs is also placed in the nine locations, such as🔽the anus.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang bsgom par bya zhe na gsungs pa /

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba de kho na gsal bar ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /

analyzed: snying gi dbus su zla ba bsam // zhes pa ste /

analyzed: de la snying gi dbus su zhes pa ni rang gi snying gi dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: ci 'dra ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /

original: shin tu mdzes pa mdangs ldan te //
analyzed: shin tu mdzes pa mdangs ldan te //

original: zhes pa'o // de'i dbus su bkod pa'i sa bon gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de'i dbus su bkod pa'i sa bon gsungs pa /

analyzed: kha ba kunda zla ba 'dra //
translated: Like snow, jasmine, or the moon.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de la kun rig ces pa ni bee ro tsa na'o //

analyzed: de dang bcas pa zhes pa ni yi ge aom ste bee ro tsa na'i sa bon gyi phyir ro //

original: aom de ni bdud rtsi'i yi gzhas bshad do //
analyzed: aom de ni bdud rtsi'i yi gzhas bshad do //

analyzed: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa'i no pi ka 'jig rten snang ba las kyang gsungs pa /

analyzed: spyi bor zla ba phyag 'tshal brlan //
translated: The moon is worshipped on the crown of the head,

original: dam pa'i sems kyis chu rgyun ni //
analyzed: dam pa'i sems kyis chu rgyun ni //
translated: and the stream of water of the holy mind

original: dbab par rim par byas nas su //
analyzed: dbab par rim par byas nas su //
translated: is caused to descend in stages,

original: sku gsung thugs la thim par bya //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs la thim par bya //
translated: and dissolves into body, speech, and mind.

original: zhes so // don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: zhes so // don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning is as follows.

analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'o mas brlan ba'i dbus su kha ba dang kunda dang 'dra ba'i mdog 'o mas gsher ba'i bsil ba'i 'od dang ldan ba'i yi ge aom bkod par bya'o zhes bya'o //
translated: In the center of a moon-disk moistened with milk, one should arrange the syllable Om, the color of snow and jasmine, with a cool radiance moistened with milk.

original: ma ning rnams ni spangs nas su //
analyzed: ma ning rnams ni spangs nas su //
translated: Having abandoned the neuters,

original: zhes pa la sogs pas ni /🔽de la / ma ning rnams ni spangs nas su //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas ni / de la / ma ning rnams ni spangs nas su //

analyzed: zhes pa ni sgra yig bcu drug la ri r'i dang / li l'i bzhi spang bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: There, having abandoned the neuters means that one should abandon the four of the sixteen vowel-signs, namely, the ri, ri, li, and li.

original: sgra yi yi ge thams cad dag / ces pa ni bcu drug la bzhi spangs ma thag tu bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: sgra yi yi ge thams cad dag / ces pa ni bcu drug la bzhi spangs ma thag tu bcu gnyis te /

analyzed: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ae aee ao aoo am aa: rnams so //
translated: They are a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a, a.

original: zla ba'i mandala glo ru ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i mandala glo ru ni //
translated: The moon maṇḍala is on the side.

original: thams cad gnas su bskor bar bye //
analyzed: thams cad gnas su bskor bar bye //
translated: All are arranged in the place.

original: zhes pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa ni //
translated: This means

analyzed: yi ge 'bru bcu gnyis kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi glo ru bskor nas bkod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: that, having arranged the twelve syllables around the side of the moon maṇḍala, they are set down.🔽The syllable oṃ of nectar is meditated on.

original: bdud rtsi'i yi ge aom de bsgom pa'i sa gsal bar ston pas gsungs pa /🔽ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i yi ge aom de bsgom pa'i sa gsal bar ston pas gsungs pa / ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni //
translated: The place is taught by Vairocana:🔽On top of the ox’s hoof,

original: bdud rtsi dag tu gzhag bya nas //
analyzed: bdud rtsi dag tu gzhag bya nas //
translated: nectar is to be placed.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: This means

analyzed: glo ba'i steng gi sgo nga 'dra ba'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zla ba la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi'i yi ge aom bzhag nas bsgom par @52b bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: that, having placed the syllable oṃ of nectar on the moon in the heart maṇḍala, which is like an egg on top of the lungs, it is to be meditated on.

analyzed: yang na yig 'bru des ye shes sems dpar gyur nas bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /

original: ye shes gzugs su bsgom byas nas //
analyzed: ye shes gzugs su bsgom byas nas //

original: gzugs mdog la sogs mdangs ldan pa //
analyzed: gzugs mdog la sogs mdangs ldan pa //
translated: with radiant complexion and so forth,

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /

analyzed: snying gi dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs su sku mdog dkar ba'o //

analyzed: bo dhi mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa 'od zer bsil bar bsgom pa'o zhes pa'o //

original: 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par //
translated: Without fear and without harm,

original: dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the entity with the entity.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: is stated.

analyzed: dngos po rnal 'byor pas dngos po ye shes sems dpar bsgom pa de la /
translated: The entity of the yogin is the meditation on the entity of the gnosis being.

analyzed: rang bzhin med pa la mi 'jigs nas dngos po dmigs pa la 'tshe ba med par stong pa dang dngos po spangs nas bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since there is no fear in the absence of nature, without harming the observation of the entity, one should meditate, abandoning emptiness and the entity.

original: de ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas zla ba'i sngags gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas zla ba'i sngags gsungs pa /
translated: The yogi who meditates in this way should recite the moon mantra.

original: 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon la //
analyzed: 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon la //
translated: The seed of the moon is milk.

original: zhes pa ste yi ge aom mo//
analyzed: zhes pa ste yi ge aom mo//
translated: This is the syllable Om.

original: phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mtha' gzhag ste //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mtha' gzhag ste //
translated: Homage, fire, and final placement.

original: zhes pa ni yi ge aom gyi gong 'og tu aom dang sv'a h'a gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yi ge aom gyi gong 'og tu aom dang sv'a h'a gzhag par bya'o //

original: 'di lta ste aom aom sv'a h'a zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste aom aom sv'a h'a zhes pa ste /
translated: This is as follows: Om Om Svaha.

analyzed: bdud rtsi'i thabs ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i yon tan dang mthu ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /
translated: Desiring to show the qualities and powers of the yogi who meditates on the nectar method samadhi, it is said:

original: mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis //
translated: The essence of the recitation of equipoise.

original: zhes pa dang po gsungs nas /
analyzed: zhes pa dang po gsungs nas /
translated: Having said this at the beginning,

original: gzugs kyi ye shes bdag nyid che //🔽zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ye shes bdag nyid che // zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: up to the great self of the wisdom of form.

original: bdud rtsi'i thabs kyis ting nge 'dzin gang du bsgom zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i thabs kyis ting nge 'dzin gang du bsgom zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If it is asked in which samadhi of the nectar method should one meditate, it is said:

original: de yi sbyor ba'i gnas dag ni //
analyzed: de yi sbyor ba'i gnas dag ni //
translated: The places of its application.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: de ltar sems tshad ma la sogs pa'i bzhi'i don rtogs nas sems snang bar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnal 'byor pa'i byin rlabs kyis don nyan 'dod pa phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa /
analyzed: de ltar sems tshad ma la sogs pa'i bzhi'i don rtogs nas sems snang bar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnal 'byor pa'i byin rlabs kyis don nyan 'dod pa phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa /
translated: Having understood the meaning of the four topics such as the valid cognition of mind in that way, the samādhi of applying the mind to appearances, the meaning of which is desired to be heard by Vajrapāṇi, is requested.

original: 'khor ba las brgal mtshan nyid dag / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba las brgal mtshan nyid dag / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The characteristics of transcending saṃsāra and so on.

original: de nas ye shes dbang po rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa'i don ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas ye shes dbang po rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa'i don ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /
translated: Then, since it is the meaning of the request of Vajrapāṇi, the meaning of the request of Jñānarāja Vajrasattva is taught with the desire to explain.

original: nyon cig ye shes de kho na //
analyzed: nyon cig ye shes de kho na //
translated: Listen, Jñāna, to the way of the real.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so on.

original: de la sngon du gnyis su med sems kyis //🔽'dod chags nyon mongs dri med chus //
analyzed: de la sngon du gnyis su med sems kyis // 'dod chags nyon mongs dri med chus //
translated: Therein, first, with a nondual mind,

original: bdag gi lus ni bkru bar bya //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ni bkru bar bya //
translated: wash one’s body with the water of passion, the stainless affliction.

original: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba'i sems bsgom pa /
analyzed: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba'i sems bsgom pa /
translated: This means that prior to samādhi, the mind free from the duality of percept and perceiver is cultivated.

original: @53a * // 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma med pa'i chu dang 'dra bas bdag gi lus bkrus nas dag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: @53a * // 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma med pa'i chu dang 'dra bas bdag gi lus bkrus nas dag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Since the water that is stainless with respect to the afflictions such as passion and so on is like water, one’s body is washed and purified.

original: de kho na'i yon tan ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kho na'i yon tan ston 'dod pas gsungs pa /
translated: The statement of the qualities of reality-itself is:

original: rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yin //🔽zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yin // zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is like a deep ocean.

analyzed: de la stong ba nyid kyi ye shes ni rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes te 'gyur ba med pa de kho na nyid ces pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of emptiness is the wisdom of essencelessness, the unchanging reality.

original: dper na ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: dper na ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yi //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yi // zhes pa ste /
translated: It is like a deep ocean.

original: rgya mtsho'i gting mi rtogs pa dang / gsher ba ci 'dra ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang rnam par rtog pa med cing snying rjes brlan pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i gting mi rtogs pa dang / gsher ba ci 'dra ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang rnam par rtog pa med cing snying rjes brlan pa zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as the depth of the ocean is not fathomed and its wetness is uniform, the wisdom of emptiness is nonconceptual and moistened with compassion.

original: phyi dang nang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phyi dang nang zhes pa ni /
translated: The internal and external are

original: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
translated: the apprehension of “I” and “mine.”

original: lus ni shel ltar dag par 'gyur //🔽zhes pa ni /🔽de lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom na /
analyzed: lus ni shel ltar dag par 'gyur // zhes pa ni / de lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom na /
translated: The body becomes clear like crystal.

original: rang gi lus dag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi lus dag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that if one meditates on the wisdom of emptiness in this way, one’s body becomes pure.

original: shel dang mtshungs pa'i lus de ni //
analyzed: shel dang mtshungs pa'i lus de ni //
translated: That body, which is like a crystal,

original: zhes pa ni de la sogs pa ye shes dbang po shes pa ni yid de /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sogs pa ye shes dbang po shes pa ni yid de /
translated: This is the knowledge of the sense organ of pristine consciousness, which is the mind.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the basis of the mental consciousness.

original: don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning is as follows:

analyzed: shel dang dung dang ku da dgang zhing gsal ba la tshon sa tshogs kyi bcos pa bzhin du dri ma med pa'i lus la dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs ye shes kyi dbang sna tshogs ji ltar 'dod par bcas par bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Just as a clear crystal, conch, or kuḍu is colored by the various colors of the collection of pigments, the various pristine consciousnesses of the collection of the sublime Dharma should be applied to the stainless body as desired.

original: lus gsal bar bya ba'i thabs ston 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: lus gsal bar bya ba'i thabs ston 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: The Bhagavān, wishing to teach the method of clarifying the body, said:

original: rang bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogin should

original: bzang byed ngan byed gyur pa yi //
analyzed: bzang byed ngan byed gyur pa yi //
translated: be good or bad by nature.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so on.

original: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge bas gyur pa'i srid pa'i dngos po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge bas gyur pa'i srid pa'i dngos po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
translated: All yogins and yoginīs are empty of good and bad by nature.

original: 'dus byas pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the nature of conditioned phenomena.

original: des na stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs nas 'joms te /
analyzed: des na stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs nas 'joms te /
translated: Therefore, having realized the nature of emptiness, one should destroy it.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes snang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes snang bar bya'o //
translated: One should illuminate the wisdom of non-duality.

original: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid brtags nas stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid brtags nas stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Having thus examined the characteristics of emptiness, the realization of emptiness is taught:

original: stong nyid gang gi mtshan nyid kyi //
analyzed: stong nyid gang gi mtshan nyid kyi //
translated: The emptiness of which is characterized

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
